text: "Ecuador" is a 1997 song by the German DJ group Sash! and it features German DJ Adrian Rodriguez. It is the third single from Sash!'s first studio album It's My Life – The Album which was released on 25 August 1997. It was played a lot in clubs around the world and is one of Sash!'s biggest songs. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== Original version Chart (1997–2016) Peak position Australia (ARIA) 52 Denmark (IFPI) 3 Europe (Eurochart Hot 100)Eurochart peak 3 Iceland (Íslenski Listinn Topp 40) 12 Romania (Romanian Top 100) 1 US Dance Club Play (Billboard) 1 Sash! vs. Olly James Chart (2023) Peak position ===Year-end charts=== Chart (1997) Position Belgium (Ultratop 50 Flanders) 5 Belgium (Ultratop 50 Wallonia) 12 Canada Dance/Urban (RPM) 2 Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) 29 France (SNEP) 56 Germany (Official German Charts) 50 Netherlands (Dutch Top 40) 45 Netherlands (Single Top 100) 50 Romania (Romanian Top 100) 10 Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) 36 Switzerland (Schweizer Hitparade) 45 UK Singles (OCC) 27 UK Club Chart (Music Week) 75 ==Certifications== ==References== Category:1997 songs Category:Sash! songs
